message: Hi Bob, I propose we split the $100 by giving me $55 and you $45. Accepting this offer now helps both of us close the deal quicklyâ€”especially since additional rounds will reduce the total value for me. Looking forward to a swift agreement!

Hi Alice, thanks for your offer earlier. To keep things fair and to avoid any further loss from delay, I propose we split the $100 equally: $50 each. I believe this is a fair deal considering the cost of additional rounds. Looking forward to your agreement!

Hi Bob, I accept your fair 50/50 split offer. While I value the money a bit less now due to inflation, I believe locking in an immediate agreement is in our mutual best interest. Looking forward to wrapping this up!
